General.Name: Etablissements Maurel & Prom S.A.
General.Description: Etablissements Maurel & Prom S.A., an independent oil and gas company, engages in the extraction and production of hydrocarbons primarily in Gabon and Tanzania, as well as Nigeria. The company operates in three segments: Exploration, Production, and Drilling. As of December 31, 2016, it had proven and probable oil reserves of 203 million barrels of oil equivalent. The company was founded in 1813 and is headquartered in Paris, France.
